data.text: Na ɛbɛka Hamat a ɔne no bɔ hye,
Tiro asi abandennen ama ne ho;
Meyi mogya9.7 Mogya—Egyina hɔ ma abosom afɔrebɔ. Akyiwade nnuan—Nnapɔnna nnuan a ho ntew. Yebusifo—Nnipa bi a wɔtenaa Yerusalem tete bere mu a wɔbɛfraa Yudafo mu. (2 Sam 24.16-24). afi wɔn ano,
Nanso mɛbɔ me Fi ho ban
Na wo de, esiane me ne wo mogya apam no nti,
Monsan nkɔ mʼaban mu, nneduafo a mowɔ anidaso;
Mɛkom Yuda sɛnea mikuntun me tadua
Afei Awurade bɛda ne ho adi wɔ wɔn so;
Awurade wɔn Nyankopɔn, begye wɔn saa da no
Sɛnea wɔn ho betwa na wɔn ho ayɛ fɛ afa!
